page.title: 04A Landlady's Daughter
page.content: I rather like living in a guest house because you get to know people and make friends. It's rather sad when all of a sudden they've got to go. Sometimes I get rather jealous; when I take in their breakfasts, I would rather eat them all. In the summer we move into the back next to the kitchen and my sister and I sleep in bunk beds. Altogether we can take 16 people as we've got 6 rooms. In the winter we close and have our own rooms back upstairs. The only trouble with having a guest house is that mum and dad don't have much time for me, but they do make it up to us in the winter. Our guest house is called Treander and we don't do evening meals, just bed and breakfast.
